title: Bug 18268 - Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories
description: Bug 18268 - Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories build 200205291235. Setup: Start eclipse. Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif>. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini>. Change the value of the aboutImage property: aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini>. Change the value of the aboutImage property: aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif. Open the about dialog. Observe: There is a main image again. This suggests that the UI is correctly passing the entire path to IPluginDescriptor.find, but that the "$nl$" path segment is not being handled correctly.
OB: The observed behavior is that when opening the about dialog, there is a main image displayed.
EB: I expect that when opening the about dialog, the main image should be displayed correctly without any issues.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Start Eclipse.
2. Delete the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif>.
3. Edit the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini>.
4. Change the value of the aboutImage property to: aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif.
5. Edit the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini>.
6. Change the value of the aboutImage property to: aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif.
7. Open the about dialog.
